subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Greg Biffle made it 2 for 2 in the Chase for the Sprint Cup, making a late pass with nine laps to go and holding off Matt Kenseth and Carl Edwards on Sunday in Dover, Del. Biffle, Kenseth and Edwards — Roush Fenway Racing teammates — engaged in a thrilling run over the final 20 laps in the Camping World RV 400, but Biffle made another textbook move to the outside late in the race to pull away.
